remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性设置为`true`进行的单个单元格，只读的。Set the property to `true` to make an individual cell read-only. 设置属性设置为`true`中的单个列进行的所有单元格，只读的。Set the property to `true` to make all cells in an individual column read-only. 设置属性设置为`true`使中的所有单元格只读如果在设置之间的冲突，列中和单元格级别，值为`true`将优先于值`false`.Set the property to `true` to make all cells in the read-only If there is a conflict between the settings at the , column, and cell levels, a value of `true` takes precedence over a value of `false`.

span.span: The data for the event.

summary.span: 报告按下了键。

span.span: Reports that a key was pressed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将传递的键盘输入包含该单元格。This method passes keyboard input to the that contains the cell. 每个列处理中，这适用于列类型的方法的输入。Each column handles the input in a way that is appropriate for the column type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSelected(class System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnSelected (e As RoutedEventArgs)
abstract member OnSelected : System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs -> unit override this.OnSelected : System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs -> unit

span.span: The data for the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还可使派生的类处理事件，而不必附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请确保调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, make sure that you call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.
